activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10475
activity.text:
Hi @khavinshankar ,

I’m interested in contributing to the FHIR Risk Assessment project and would love to get a head start. The project looks fascinating, and I’m excited to learn more about how it integrates with the existing CARE architecture.

To get started, I had a couple of questions:

Is there a specific area within the backend or frontend that requires immediate attention?
Are there any beginner-friendly issues or tasks that would help me familiarize myself with the FHIR standards and the current codebase?
